price: 57. Naf walbaa waa tii dhadhamisa geeri. Xaggayagaana la idiin soo celin.
arabic: كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡنَا تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: kullu nafsin dhāiqatu al-mawti thumma ilaynā tur'jaʿūna
